ResourceHeader.Description: Ground-based vector magnetic field at Tasiilaq, Greenland, 1 min, Level-2 data, DTU Network, Higher latitude chain (Lat 65.6, Long 322.4). Station Code: AMK.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: C. Stolle, J. Matzka, Tromso Geophysical Observatory, University of Tromso, Norway

NumericalData.Keyword: CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Magnetospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DISCIPLINE: Space Physics>Ionospheric Science
CDF Global Attribute DATA_TYPE: MAG>Magnetic Field
CDF Global Attribute GENERATION_DATE: Tue May 10 10:42:38 2011
CDF Global Attribute MODS: Revision Dec 01 2008. Revision May 04 2011 (New Data Provider)
CDF Global Attribute GENERATED_BY: THEMIS SOC

CDF Global Attribute RULES_OF_USE: The geomagnetic information available at our web-pages is primarily intended for the non-commercial scientific community, educational purposes, and the general Public. Commercial users of our services are urged to contact us to establish an agreement of use. As part of an agreement we normally offer to construct exclusive web-pages specifically for the application in question. We accept no liability for loss or damages of any kind resulting from this or from errors or inaccuracies in the data.

Parameter.Name: B in HDZ Components
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_amk_epoch
Parameter.Description: Magnetic field B in HDZ vector components

Parameter.Name: H component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_amk_epoch
Parameter.Description: H component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_amk.

Parameter.Name: D component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_amk_epoch
Parameter.Description: D component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_amk.

Parameter.Name: Z component of B
Parameter.Set: Time series defined by using: thg_mag_amk_epoch
Parameter.Description: Z component of the Magnetic Field Vector
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function ALTERNATE_VIEW with the following input parameters: thg_mag_amk.

Parameter.Name: thg_mag_amk_epoch
Parameter.Caveats: This parameter is virtual. It is calculated by calling the function COMP_THEMIS_EPOCH with the following input parameters: thg_mag_amk_epoch0, thg_mag_amk_time.
